-- ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
-- DEMO DATA: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat
-- ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

-- 1. Organization
INSERT INTO client_organizations (name, nameFr, orgType, sector, contactName, contactEmail, contactPhone, address, city, province, postalCode, contractStartDate, contractEndDate, status, maxParticipants, notes)
VALUES (
  'Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat',
  'Secrétariat du Conseil du Trésor du Canada',
  'federal_department',
  'Central Agencies',
  'Marie-Claire Dupont',
  'marie-claire.dupont@tbs-sct.gc.ca',
  '613-555-0142',
  '90 Elgin Street',
  'Ottawa',
  'ON',
  'K1A 0R5',
  '2025-09-01',
  '2026-08-31',
  'active',
  30,
  'Annual bilingual training contract for Policy Sector employees'
);

-- 2. Participants (12 realistic Canadian public servants)
INSERT INTO participants (organizationId, firstName, lastName, email, employeeId, department, position, currentLevel, targetLevel, program, status) VALUES
(1, 'Jean-François', 'Tremblay', 'jf.tremblay@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-001', 'Policy Sector', 'Senior Policy Analyst', 'B1', 'B2', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Sarah', 'Mitchell', 's.mitchell@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-002', 'Policy Sector', 'Policy Analyst', 'A2', 'B2', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Priya', 'Sharma', 'p.sharma@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-003', 'Digital Policy', 'IT Analyst', 'A1', 'B1', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Marc-Antoine', 'Leblanc', 'ma.leblanc@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-004', 'Expenditure Management', 'Financial Officer', 'B2', 'C1', 'ESL', 'active'),
(1, 'Emily', 'Chen', 'e.chen@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-005', 'People Management', 'HR Advisor', 'A2', 'B1', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Ahmed', 'Hassan', 'a.hassan@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-006', 'Regulatory Affairs', 'Regulatory Analyst', 'B1', 'B2', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Isabelle', 'Gagnon', 'i.gagnon@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-007', 'Policy Sector', 'Director', 'B2', 'C1', 'ESL', 'active'),
(1, 'David', 'Thompson', 'd.thompson@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-008', 'Digital Policy', 'Project Manager', 'A1', 'B2', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Fatima', 'Al-Rashid', 'f.alrashid@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-009', 'Expenditure Management', 'Budget Analyst', 'A2', 'B1', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Robert', 'Lavoie', 'r.lavoie@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-010', 'People Management', 'Classification Officer', 'B1', 'C1', 'ESL', 'on_hold'),
(1, 'Jennifer', 'Patel', 'j.patel@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-011', 'Regulatory Affairs', 'Senior Advisor', 'B1', 'B2', 'FSL', 'active'),
(1, 'Youssef', 'Benali', 'y.benali@tbs-sct.gc.ca', 'TBS-2024-012', 'Policy Sector', 'Economist', 'A2', 'B2', 'FSL', 'completed');

-- 3. Training Cohorts (3 cohorts)
INSERT INTO training_cohorts (organizationId, name, nameFr, program, cefrLevel, startDate, endDate, schedule, maxParticipants, currentParticipants, status, description) VALUES
(1, 'FSL Intermediate - Spring 2026', 'FLS Intermédiaire - Printemps 2026', 'FSL', 'B1', '2026-02-03', '2026-05-29', 'Mon/Wed/Fri 9:00-10:30', 8, 6, 'active', 'Intensive FSL training for Policy Sector employees preparing for SLE oral assessment'),
(1, 'FSL Beginner - Spring 2026', 'FLS Débutant - Printemps 2026', 'FSL', 'A2', '2026-02-10', '2026-06-12', 'Tue/Thu 13:00-14:30', 8, 4, 'active', 'Foundation FSL course for new employees requiring basic bilingual proficiency'),
(1, 'ESL Advanced - Winter 2026', 'ALS Avancé - Hiver 2026', 'ESL', 'C1', '2026-01-13', '2026-04-17', 'Wed 10:00-12:00', 6, 3, 'active', 'Advanced ESL coaching for francophone managers targeting C1 proficiency');

-- 4. Cohort Participants
INSERT INTO cohort_participants (cohortId, participantId, status) VALUES
(1, 1, 'active'), (1, 6, 'active'), (1, 11, 'active'), (1, 2, 'active'), (1, 5, 'active'), (1, 9, 'active'),
(2, 3, 'active'), (2, 8, 'active'), (2, 5, 'enrolled'), (2, 9, 'enrolled'),
(3, 4, 'active'), (3, 7, 'active'), (3, 10, 'enrolled');

-- 5. Billing Records
INSERT INTO billing_records (organizationId, invoiceNumber, description, descriptionFr, amount, billingType, status, issuedDate, dueDate, paidDate, cohortId) VALUES
(1, 'RA-2026-001', 'FSL Intermediate Training Package - Spring 2026 (6 participants)', 'Forfait FLS Intermédiaire - Printemps 2026 (6 participants)', 2400000, 'training_package', 'paid', '2026-01-15', '2026-02-15', '2026-02-10', 1),
(1, 'RA-2026-002', 'FSL Beginner Training Package - Spring 2026 (4 participants)', 'Forfait FLS Débutant - Printemps 2026 (4 participants)', 1600000, 'training_package', 'paid', '2026-01-20', '2026-02-20', '2026-02-18', 2),
(1, 'RA-2026-003', 'ESL Advanced Coaching Package - Winter 2026 (3 participants)', 'Forfait coaching ALS Avancé - Hiver 2026 (3 participants)', 1350000, 'coaching_session', 'sent', '2026-01-10', '2026-02-10', NULL, 3),
(1, 'RA-2026-004', 'SLE Assessment Materials & Practice Tests', 'Matériel d''évaluation ELS et tests pratiques', 450000, 'material', 'paid', '2025-12-01', '2025-12-31', '2025-12-20', NULL),
(1, 'RA-2026-005', 'Individual Coaching Sessions - February 2026 (8 sessions)', 'Séances de coaching individuel - Février 2026 (8 séances)', 960000, 'coaching_session', 'draft', '2026-02-28', '2026-03-31', NULL, NULL);

-- 6. Budget Allocations
INSERT INTO budget_allocations (organizationId, fiscalYear, totalBudget, allocatedAmount, spentAmount, category, notes) VALUES
(1, '2025-2026', 8000000, 6760000, 4450000, 'training', 'Annual training budget for bilingual development programs'),
(1, '2025-2026', 2000000, 1350000, 960000, 'coaching', 'Individual and group coaching sessions budget'),
(1, '2025-2026', 1000000, 450000, 450000, 'assessment', 'SLE assessment preparation and practice materials'),
(1, '2025-2026', 500000, 200000, 120000, 'materials', 'Learning materials, textbooks, and digital resources');

-- 7. Compliance Records
INSERT INTO compliance_records (organizationId, participantId, assessmentType, currentResult, targetResult, assessmentDate, nextAssessmentDate, status) VALUES
(1, 1, 'sle_oral', 'B', 'C', '2025-11-15', '2026-05-15', 'in_progress'),
(1, 1, 'sle_writing', 'B', 'C', '2025-11-15', '2026-05-15', 'in_progress'),

(1, 4, 'sle_writing', 'C', 'C', '2025-09-20', NULL, 'achieved'),
(1, 7, 'sle_oral', 'B', 'C', '2025-08-15', '2026-03-15', 'in_progress'),
(1, 7, 'sle_writing', 'C', 'C', '2025-08-15', NULL, 'achieved'),
(1, 7, 'sle_reading', 'C', 'C', '2025-08-15', NULL, 'achieved'),
(1, 12, 'sle_oral', 'B', 'B', '2025-12-10', NULL, 'achieved'),
(1, 12, 'sle_writing', 'B', 'B', '2025-12-10', NULL, 'achieved'),

-- 8. Coaching Sessions
INSERT INTO coaching_sessions (participantId, organizationId, cohortId, sessionType, title, description, scheduledAt, durationMinutes, status, meetingUrl) VALUES
(1, 1, 1, 'individual', 'SLE Oral Prep - Jean-François', 'Individual coaching for oral SLE preparation, focus on spontaneous speech', '2026-02-17 14:00:00', 60, 'scheduled', 'https://meet.google.com/abc-defg-hij'),
(2, 1, 1, 'individual', 'FSL Writing Workshop - Sarah', 'Writing skills development: formal correspondence and policy briefs', '2026-02-18 10:00:00', 60, 'scheduled', 'https://meet.google.com/klm-nopq-rst'),

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 87: Unknown column 'participantId' in 'field list'
